CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 带来；取来；拿来；引起；导致；提供；供给；引导；携带；促使；使得；带领；引进；起诉；提起（诉讼）；起诉；使参与；使处于某种状况；使进入某种状态；吸引；带…到某处；使恢复意识；唤醒；使复苏

synonym.mean: 带来；促使；引起；使某人处于某种情况或境地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
指一往一返，相当于go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。
口语用词，与fetch基本同义，语气随便。
指使用车辆或机械设备把人或货物从一处运载到另一处。
指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。

word_group.brief_definition: 开始谈论, 提到；抚养, 教养
推行；采用（新的法律或制度）；赚得；挣（钱）；引入；请来；邀请
强调；生产, 出版, 推出
使（某人）苏醒；（使）停驶；把…带给（某人）或带往（某处）
引起；导致（疾病、痛苦或某种感觉）
提出；公布；引起；生产；产出
启用, 使运转, 使起作用

bilingual.target: 爱好给我们的生活带来快乐。

bilingual.source: They bring good luck to the birthday person.
bilingual.target: 它们给过生日的人带来好运。

bilingual.source: What advantages can hobbies bring to young people?
bilingual.target: 爱好能给年轻人带来什么好处？

bilingual.source: Big windows bring in lots of sunlight and fresh air.
bilingual.target: 大窗户带来很多阳光和新鲜空气。

bilingual.source: Certain types bring rain, which provides vital water.
bilingual.target: 某些类型的云带来雨水，提供重要的水源。

bilingual.source: If people find a sick animal, they bring it to us.
bilingual.target: 如果人们发现生病的动物，他们会带来给我们。

bilingual.source: Greek people think onions can bring them good luck and health.
bilingual.target: 希腊人认为洋葱能带来好运和健康。

bilingual.source: The three seamen I paid to get me on bring biscuits and water.
bilingual.target: 我付钱让三个海员带我上船，他们带来了饼干和水。

bilingual.source: If their numbers drop too low, it will bring danger to all ocean life.
bilingual.target: 如果它们的数量下降太多，会给所有海洋生物带来危险。

bilingual.source: The poem describes an important family tradition that is said to bring luck.
bilingual.target: 这首诗描述了一种据说会带来好运的重要家庭传统。

list.abstract: bring（英 [brɪŋ]，美 [brɪŋ]），英语单词，作动词为带来；拿来；取来。短语搭配有bring back（带回）。例句为“They bring heavy rain and floods.（它们带来暴雨和洪水。）” bring相关近义词有attract、produce等，相关反义词有take away。

yingyinNormal.en: And what did you bring me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你又带来了什么？

yingyinNormal.en: But we did bring you holy oil from…
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们给您带来了圣油...

yingyinNormal.en: Bring him in. There's been a complication.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把他带来，但是有一个并发症。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: So did you bring a little something for Ross?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，你给罗斯带来点东西？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, hey, or I could bring my keyboard here sometime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也可以把键盘带来。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me gather them, bring them here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我把他们集合过来，把他们带来这里。

yingyinNormal.en: Why did you bring him? He's harshing my buzz.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要把他带来？太扫兴了。

yingyinNormal.en: But where are the Christian priests you were to bring?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你们本应带来的牧师在哪呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Survive. Bring peace between orcs and humans. You must.
yingyinNormal.zh: 活下去，为兽人与人类之间带来和平，你必须这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you bring it? Sorry? My hairband. Did you bring it, like I asked?
yingyinNormal.zh: 带来了吗？什么？我的发带。按我说的带来了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Bring him with us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把他带来。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to bring my pet gold fish. I'm going to bring my sticky insect. I'll bring my gecko.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我可以把我的金鱼金金带来学校。我要把我的竹节虫带过来。我要把我的壁虎带过来。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Han, you shouldn't bring your sex doll out in public.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿憨，你不该把性爱人偶带来公共场合哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Zoe can bring Monkey if she wants to. Home time, children. Don't forget your pets for the competition tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果佐伊想的话可以把猴子带来。孩子们，放学了。别忘了明天把宠物带来参加竞赛啊。

yingyinNormal.en: This is insane. Do you know how much business I bring in here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也太离谱了吧，你知道我给你们带来了多少收入吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Did they also bring their balls? Yes, they have many, many balls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们把球[蛋蛋]也带来了吗？对，他们有非常多的球[蛋蛋]。

yingyinNormal.en: She wants to bring us $38 million in business. I don't see the downside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她要给我们带来3千8百万的生意，我不觉得有什么不好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Depending on what animal you are, the new year ahead could bring good or bad news.
yingyinNormal.zh: 根据你具体属什么，要到来的春节带来的运道有好有坏。

yingyinNormal.en: Make a batch of Nian Gao, steamed cakes made with rice flour, which are said to bring good luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做一些由米粉蒸出来的年糕，据说这样会带来好运。

yingyinNormal.en: And you know what we should do? Bring Monica and then we could all live there together. We'll have so much fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且我们应该把莫妮卡也带来，一定会很好玩。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 导致; 引起; 带来
(bring forth)提出; 生产; 产出
(bring out)强调; 生产; 推出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 推行；采用；赚(钱)；引入；邀请
提出；公布；引起；生产；产出

sense_info_list.en: to come to a place with sb/sth

examination_example.sentence: A group of Labour MPs are <highlight>bringing</highlight> in the new year with a call to institute a UK "town of culture" award.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一群工党议员在新年到来之际呼吁设立英国“文化之城”奖。

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that hugs can <highlight>bring</highlight> a host of health benefits to your body and mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，拥抱可以给你的身体和心灵带来很多健康益处。

examination_example.sentence: To the anxious travelers the sight of the American shore <highlight>brought</highlight> almost inexpressible relief.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对焦虑的旅行者来说，美国海岸的景色带来了难以言喻的宽慰。

sense_info_list.en: Put in a certain state (or situation)

examination_example.sentence: Upcoming reforms might <highlight>bring</highlight> the price to a more reasonable level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即将到来的改革可能会把价格带到一个更合理的水平。

examination_example.sentence: "A Dinner at Poplar Walk" <highlight>brought</highlight> tears to Dickens's eyes when he discovered it in the pages of The Monthly Magazine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当狄更斯在《月刊》上发现《白杨树散步的晚餐》时，他的眼泪都流出来了。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes storms blew the vessels far off their course, and often calm <highlight>brought</highlight> unbearably long delay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时风暴会将船只吹离航线，而平静通常会使船只处于难以忍受的长时间的延误。

sense_info_list.en: To bring something or someone to a place or position means to cause them to come to the place or move into that position.

examination_example.sentence: The same curiosity to find what lies beyond the horizon that first <highlight>brought</highlight> early Polynesians to Hawaii's shores inspires astronomers today to explore the heavens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去寻找地平线之外的东西的好奇心，是最早让早期波利尼西亚人来到夏威夷海岸的理由，这同样激发了今天的天文学家去探索天空。

examination_example.sentence: Each spouse retains whatever property he or she <highlight>brought</highlight> into the marriage, and jointly-acquired property is divided equally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夫妻双方保留其带入婚姻的任何财产，共同获得的财产平均分配。

examination_example.sentence: Such dimensions of reading suggest that we <highlight>bring</highlight> an implicit agenda to any act of reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的阅读维度表明，我们给任何阅读行为都带来了一个隐含的议程。

sense_info_list.en: cause, result in, or produce a state or condition
sense_info_list.zh: 导致; 引起; 带来

examination_example.sentence: can <highlight>bring</highlight> psychological benefits
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能带来心理上的好处

examination_example.sentence: can <highlight>bring</highlight> about emotional satisfaction
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能带来情感上的满足

examination_example.sentence: can <highlight>bring</highlight> about greater efficiency
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以带来更高的效率

examination_example.sentence: The report calls for the encouragement of scholars to <highlight>bring</highlight> their learning to bear on the great challenges of the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告呼吁鼓励学者们使用他们的学识来应对当今的巨大挑战。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Bring</highlight> out more evils of human nature
examination_example.sentence_trans: 揭露更多人性的邪恶

sense_info_list.zh: (bring forth)提出; 生产; 产出

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Bring</highlight> forth innovative computer technologies
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提出创新计算机技术

examination_example.sentence: Their success may be determined by a suit related to this issue, <highlight>brought</highlight> by the Mayo Clinic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的成功可能取决于梅奥诊所提起的与此问题相关的诉讼。

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to move in a particular direction or way
make or begin as part of an official legal process

sense_info_list.zh: (bring out)强调; 生产; 推出

word_usage.usage: bring sb. to…，表示“把某人带到某处”，而bring sth. to sb.=bring sb. sth.表示“把某物带给某人”

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“拿来；带来”，指物体朝说话人方向移动。
意为“随身带着”，没有明确的方向性，同时强调体力方面的负担。
意为“拿来；找回”，指前往某处后带回某物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>bringing</highlight> prosperity to the region.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它给该地区带来了繁荣。

examination_example.sentence: Moving into the future, we want James Dean to be <highlight>brought</highlight> into different gaming environments, or different virtual reality environments, or augmented reality environments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 展望未来，我们希望詹姆斯·迪恩被带入不同的游戏环境，或不同的虚拟现实环境，或增强现实环境。

examination_example.sentence: This way new idols have been <highlight>brought</highlight> to the stage: politicians, celebrities, and other big names.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过这种方式，新的偶像被带到了舞台上：政客、名人和其他名人。

examination_example.sentence: An excessive trust in theoretical conviction would have prevented Marconi from persisting in experiments which were destined to <highlight>bring</highlight> about a revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对理论信念的过度信任会阻止Marconi坚持进行注定会带来革命的实验。

examination_example.sentence: As an integral part of learning, it <highlight>brings</highlight> about positive changes, making people develop and grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为学习的一个组成部分，它引起了积极的变化，使人发展和成长。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>brought</highlight> about a fundamental shift in the way we communicate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他给我们的交流方式带来了根本性的转变。

examination_example.sentence: Make sure they are <highlight>brought</highlight> under control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保他们处于控制之下。

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>brought</highlight> celebrities closer to their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让名人更接近他们的生活。

examination_example.sentence: The process of ageing can ultimately be <highlight>brought</highlight> under control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 衰老的过程最终得以控制。

sense_info_list.en: cause, result in, or produce a state or condition

examination_example.sentence: The use of digital technology can <highlight>bring</highlight> images of deceased celebrities back to the screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字技术的使用可以将已故名人的影像重新搬上银幕。

examination_example.sentence: When we are <highlight>bringing</highlight> someone back, representing someone who is no longer alive on the screen, what we are doing is extremely sophisticated digital make-up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们把一个人带回来，在屏幕上代表一个已经不在人世的人时，我们所做的是极其复杂的电子数字特效化妆。

examination_example.sentence: The news was met with excitement by those keen to see Dean digitally <highlight>brought</highlight> back to life for only his fourth film.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个消息让那些渴望看到迪安在他的第四部电影中用数字技术复活的人兴奋不已。

word_usage.usage:
bring是非延续性动词，在肯定句中一般不与表示一段时间的状语连用。
正 I brought the dictionary a week ago. 
错 I've brought the dictionary for a week.

bring作“引起”时，可接复合宾语，并以现在分词、过去分词充当补足语，如：
bring me running 使我奔跑；
bring us noticed 使我们被注意到。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点, 强调方向, 不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方, 不涉及方向, 只强调方式。
指通过中间人传递信息, 或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
指一往一返, 相当于 go and bring, 去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It permits employees to <highlight>bring</highlight> cats into their office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它允许员工带猫上班。

examination_example.sentence: California legislators passed a bill last year that will <highlight>bring</highlight> ethnic studies to all its public high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州立法者去年通过了一项法案，将把种族研究引入所有公立高中。

examination_example.sentence: Firsthand accounts seem to indicate a small wave of people <highlight>bringing</highlight> piles of donation bags to used goods stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据第一手资料显示，有一小批人把一堆堆的捐赠袋带到二手商店。

sense_info_list.en: cause; result in; or produce a state or condition

examination_example.sentence: It will <highlight>bring</highlight> about radical economic and social changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将引起重大的经济及社会变革。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of <highlight>bringing</highlight> families together, Aderhold's letter revealed a divide in the district, which has 9, 700 students, and one that broke down roughly along racial lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德的信非但没能让家长们团结起来，反而揭露了这个拥有9700名学生的学区存在的分歧，而且这种分歧大致是按照种族界限来划分的。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>brought</highlight> cars closer towards the reach of ordinary people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它拉近了汽车与普通人的距离。

sense_info_list.en: to cause somebody/something to be a particular condition or place

examination_example.sentence: Make sure to <highlight>bring</highlight> the audience into the conversation so that it is not one-sided.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一定要让听众参与到对话中来，这样才不会片面。

word_usage.usage:
bring是非延续性动词，在肯定句中一般不与表示一段时间的状语连用。
正 I brought the dictionary a week ago. 
错 I've brought the dictionary for a week.

bring作“引起”时，可接复合宾语，并以现在分词、过去分词充当补足语，如：
bring me running 使我奔跑；
bring us noticed 使我们被注意到。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
指一往一返，相当于 go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 开始谈论；提到；抚养；教养

examination_example.sentence: How pleased and proud Mother would be when they <highlight>brought</highlight> her breakfast in bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们把早餐送到母亲的床上时，她会多么高兴和自豪。

examination_example.sentence: What did Alex <highlight>bring</highlight> back?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚历克斯带回来了什么？

examination_example.sentence: Why did the author <highlight>bring</highlight> the tiger cubs home?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者为什么要把老虎幼崽带回家？

examination_example.sentence: Andria Zafirakou,a north London secondary school teacher, said she wanted to <highlight>bring</highlight> about a classroom revolution (变革).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安德里亚·扎菲拉库是伦敦北部的一名中学教师，她说她想带来一场课堂革命。

examination_example.sentence: The class experiment that day was to show how heating a container of water would <highlight>bring</highlight> air bubbling (冒泡) to the surface.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天的课堂实验是为了展示加热一个盛水的容器是如何将气泡带到表面的。

examination_example.sentence: When he <highlight>brings</highlight> his speech to a nice conclusion, Whaley invites the rest of the class to praise him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他的演讲顺利结束时，威利邀请全班同学来表扬他。

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, the arts can <highlight>bring</highlight> communities together, reducing loneliness and making people feel safer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，艺术可以让社区团结起来，减少孤独感，让人们感到更安全。

examination_example.sentence: Paul and I didn't see each other all that regularly, but sharing that <highlight>brought</highlight> us together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保罗和我不常见面，但分享让我们走到了一起。

examination_example.sentence: In the coming months, we are <highlight>bringing</highlight> together artists from all over the globe, to enjoy speaking Shakespeare's plays in their own language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的几个月里，我们将邀请全球各地的艺术家，用他们自己的语言来欣赏莎士比亚的戏剧。

examination_example.sentence: Thus, it may be worth <highlight>bringing</highlight> up issues with your friends, family members, or classmates rather than holding them back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，向你的朋友、家人或同学提出问题可能比隐瞒更有价值。

examination_example.sentence: This picture often <highlight>brings</highlight> back to me many happy memories of my high school days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这张照片经常让我回想起高中时代的许多美好回忆。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: bring意为“带来”，方向是朝着说话人所在之处的，但有时bring表示的方向也可以是朝向说话人曾经待过或将要去的地方。
fetch意为“去拿来”，指到别处去取东西或找人然后带回来。fetch和bring均含“到某处去拿来”之意，但 fetch含有“专程去做”之意，bring则无此含义。如果距离较远时，一般用fetch。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 带来; 导致; 引起

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 带回；唤起（回忆）；使忆起；恢复；重新使用
推行；采用（新的法律或制度）；赚得；挣（钱）；引入；请来；邀请
开始谈论；提到；抚养；教养
使（某人）苏醒；（使）停驶；把…带给（某人）或带往（某处）
引起；导致（疾病、痛苦或某种感觉）

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>bring</highlight> my books into the faraway hills and share what I have with the children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以把我的书带到遥远的山里，和孩子们分享我所拥有的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Learning is a lifelong journey because every day <highlight>brings</highlight> something new.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学习是一个终生的旅程，因为每天都会带来新的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Money and success alone do not <highlight>bring</highlight> happiness forever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 金钱和成功本身并不能永远带来幸福。

sense_info_list.en: cause, result in, or produce a state or condition
sense_info_list.zh: 带来; 导致; 引起

examination_example.sentence: The fire <highlight>brought</highlight> damage (损害) to the area about 350 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约350年前，这场大火给该地区造成损害。

examination_example.sentence: For people who are learning a foreign language, idioms could cause misunderstandings and <highlight>bring</highlight> them endless headaches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于正在学习外语的人来说，习语可能会引起误解，给他们带来无尽的烦恼。

examination_example.sentence: Diabetes can <highlight>bring</highlight> serious problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 糖尿病会带来严重的问题。

sense_info_list.en: Put in a certain state (or situation)

examination_example.sentence: By controlling your breathing, you <highlight>bring</highlight> your mind to work together with your body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过控制你的呼吸，你使得自己的思想和身体协同工作。

examination_example.sentence: Although the outbreak of COVID-19 is a terrible blow to the country, the government is trying hard to <highlight>bring</highlight> the situation under control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管新冠肺炎的爆发对该国来说是一个可怕的打击，但政府正在努力控制局势。

examination_example.sentence: Although the storm broke many things apart,it <highlight>brought</highlight> families and neighbors closer together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管暴风雨使许多事情分崩离析，但它使家庭和邻居更加亲密。

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>brought</highlight> up by my grandma, and now it's my turn to take care of her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是奶奶带大的，现在轮到我照顾她了。

examination_example.sentence: Children in China are <highlight>brought</highlight> up with the education of filial devotion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国的孩子是在孝道教育下长大的。

examination_example.sentence: Kids with pleasant names are easy to <highlight>bring</highlight> up, according to an ancient Chinese saying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据中国的一句古话，名字好听的孩子很容易养育。

sense_info_list.en: cause (someone or something) to move in a particular direction or way

examination_example.sentence: The crocodile noticed the accident, so down he dived, and <highlight>brought</highlight> it up in his huge mouth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鳄鱼注意到了这一事故，于是俯冲下去，用它的大嘴把它叼了上来。

examination_example.sentence: At the top of your jump, <highlight>bring</highlight> the knees to the chest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳到最高处时，将膝盖带向胸部方向。

examination_example.sentence: Jump high, <highlight>bring</highlight> the legs up, and point the toes forward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳得高一些，把双腿抬起来，脚趾指向前方。

examination_example.sentence: Sally thinks that old things always <highlight>bring</highlight> back sweet memories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莎莉认为旧的东西总能唤起美好的回忆。

examination_example.sentence: Amy wants to keep her old things because they <highlight>bring</highlight> back sweet memories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米想保留她的旧东西，因为它们能唤起美好的回忆。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>brings</highlight> the good old days back to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让我想起了过去的美好时光。

examination_example.sentence: Being a parent has <highlight>brought</highlight> out all his love and sense of duty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲的角色使他展现了所有的爱和责任感。

examination_example.sentence: They always <highlight>bring</highlight> out the best in me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们总是使我能将最好的一面展现出来。

examination_example.sentence: All children in some form have talents; the trick is to <highlight>bring</highlight> it out in them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的孩子在某种形式上都有天赋；诀窍是使它们能表现出来。

examination_example.sentence: You don't know how to <highlight>bring</highlight> back forests that once grew where there is now desert.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你们不知道如何把现在的沙漠恢复成那里原本的森林。

examination_example.sentence: For some teachers, this means <highlight>bringing</highlight> back a valuable lesson plan that has been put off for some time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一些教师来说，这意味着恢复了一项推迟了一段时间的有价值的教案。

examination_example.sentence: People should try to <highlight>bring</highlight> back the army's bright colors
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们应该努力恢复军队的光辉。

examination_example.sentence: What doesn't <highlight>bring</highlight> down the number of polar bears according to this passage?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这篇文章，什么不能减少北极熊的数量？

examination_example.sentence: A poor community in the developing world may find it difficult to <highlight>bring</highlight> in foreign fruits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发展中国家的贫困社区可能会很难引进外国水果。

examination_example.sentence: I was amazed to discover that a small tea factory could <highlight>bring</highlight> in 6 million yuan a year with only 20 workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我惊奇地发现，一家小茶厂只有20名工人，而一年可以赚600万元。

word_usage.usage:
bring是非延续性动词，在肯定句中一般不与表示一段时间的状语连用。
正 I brought the dictionary a week ago. 
错 I've brought the dictionary for a week.

bring作“引起”时，可接复合宾语，并以现在分词、过去分词充当补足语，如：
bring me running 使我奔跑；
bring us noticed 使我们被注意到。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指从某处把人或物带到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
